title: Switch Expression with yield
description:
Create a method getGrade(int score) that returns:
- 90-100: "A" (print "Excellent!" too)
- 80-89: "B"
- 70-79: "C"
- 60-69: "D"
- below 60: "F"

Use switch expression with yield for the A grade case.

Test: getGrade(95) should print "Excellent!" and return "A"
instructions:
Create a method getGrade(int score) that returns:
- 90-100: "A" (print "Excellent!" too)
- 80-89: "B"
- 70-79: "C"
- 60-69: "D"
- below 60: "F"

Use switch expression with yield for the A grade case.

hints.text: Divide score by 10 to get a single digit for the switch
Use { } block with yield for multiple statements: case 9 -> { print(); yield "A"; }

commonMistakes.mistake: Using return instead of yield in switch expression block
commonMistakes.correction: Use yield to return a value from a switch expression block
